title: Ok, seriously Riot, who killed Miss Fortune's mom?
body:
Rito pls, don't leave us in the dark, tell us.

Who do you think killed her mom? 4 years ago it was a mystery, a guy with red eyes and a bandanna, since a lot of champions have been released during those 4 years, is there anyone who could have killed her mom out of the current roster of champions? Also no Talon, he was at the sewers at that time and was way too young. from his looks, he seems to be young even though his voice is deep.

replies.body: It will probably be revealed in the event (although the most popular opinion/most likely culprit is that is was Gangplank's dad)
Jaredan you little rascal you c'mere and give me a hug!
Well, OK, but I warn you: I hug strong, I hug long.
if you didn't I'd consider you a lesser man. Only true men hug long and strong.

{{champion:161}} _O

And we have to wait at least a week until we find out! Why must you taunt me so?

Or Gp is MF dad :D

They do fight together at some point to counter the Fog from the Harrowing

Act One – Part Four
> _Gangplank’s face flushed an angry shade of crimson as he pulled on his greatcoat and claimed his hat from its peg. **His eyes glinted red** in the lamplight. The child was not alone in taking a wary step back._

Coincidence?

 I think NOT

Agreed. They also seem to be pushing GP to be fairly older than before, so i could see him, as a teenager, being the killer.

His older chest hair splash also had the red eye, further suggesting that he is the killer. Personally, i am more curious if GP actually remembers killing her, or if he knows that was MF's mother.

> [{quoted}](name=igntitr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YbmxM1oR,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-06-27T01:38:33.603+0000)
>
> I THOUGHT I WAS THRESH

Oi.

Don't necro 3 year old threads.

That's against the (Updated) Boards Universal Rules.
Cutthroat Graves is wearing a bandana.
